# Default bundler for Forge apps

## API

```javascript
import { bundle, watch } from '@atlassian/forge-bundler';

// bundle example
const { output, sourceMap } = await bundle(endpoint);

// watch example
const monitor = watch(endpoint, (err, output) => {
  if (err) {
    log(err);
  } else {
    // ...
  }
});

monitor.stop();
```
